text: Lugard may refer to: *Edward Lugard, British army officer. *Sir Frederick Lugard, 1st Baron Lugard, British colonial bureaucrat and military officer. *Lugard Footbridge, in Kaduna, Nigeria, named after Baron Lugard. *Lugard Road, one of many places in Hong Kong named after Baron Lugard. *, a Uganda Railway paddle steamer named after Baron Lugard and built in 1927. *, a Kenya and Uganda Railways and Harbours paddle steamer named after Baron Lugard and built in 1946. *Lugard is also the capital city of Murandy in the Wheel of Time series of novels by Robert Jordan.
title: Lugard
